Film's are often in between a rock and a hard place when it comes to anything based off of original material. With books or short stories there is often too much or too little information and some deviation is required to maintain the story. Not to say they couldn't butcher it in the process, but I suspect they could stick true and butcher it as well just in other ways.  Most of the time however I think it is best for them to stick as closely as they can to the original material if it has not been used in a film already.

He really kicked ass in this. Brightened my attitude after a lackluster legislative year.

<lj-embed id="1"/>
Today has not been the most productive of days for me, I have at least gotten dinner started. I need to be more productive, How does one kick ones own ass.

I post as frequently on this as maybe once or twice every few years. Lord knows I don't want to check to see the actuality of this. I don't know if I want to call this a new years resolution, but I have to call this something. IN a striving way to get back into a writing groove, I've decided to dedicate myself to update this every day. 

Today we had Mussels for dinner, Meredith is feeling under the weather, and I am well doing this. This is about a summation of the day I can get. I'll be doing free writing too, which is what this is in some ways. Steeling myself with the repetitive click clack of my typing so i get used to the sound, so I get used to the feeling and nature.  Though Writing this is much easier than writing stories. 

I have to remind myself it's this or clean!

If I had the money my CD want list is growing.

Paolo Nutini
Lily Allen (the new one)
Queen's greatest hits
Hollywood undead

If I get my bonus I think i'll set aside 75-100 just on new cd's I want.
If you like Harry potter, a comic called sluggy freelance has the mast hilarious running spoof on the potter books/films.  You have to read the entire comic for the full effect though.

Past two weeks have been ugh.. and well pretty much past month and a half. 
This week, monday was fine. then tuesday hour of over time, wednesday two hours of shopping and oen of cooking, today hour and a half of over time, friday hour of overtime hour of cooking.  

It's leaving me less time than I like to cool down. It also means the dishes are piling up in the kitchen. I just don't have the energy to do them with all this extra work. Then on the weekend because of a big trip beginning of april I have to work on my game with my friends. Friends can be tiring too. 

It basically has left me feeling incompitant at housework recently... sigh.

I started looking at the them not really caring for obama, even though my wife preferred him. Slowly looking at his policy and past his rhetoric I gave him a slight edge over clinton, It was clinton's mean spirit that turned me off her and officially onto obama. 

Recently I've been seeing a very mean spirited backlash against him. Just look at SNL from this past weekend. Many are upset at the almost blind passion of his followers. A chunk of clinton supporters are yelling if he gets the nomination they just won't vote. There policy's are still pretty similar with a few slight differences in them and a big one in rhetoric. It's like they choose to vote not on their policy's or beliefs but because "THEIR" choice got rejected or burned. 

There is also a more subtle hit that despite the massive amounts of new registered voters, that he  has 0 chance of turning red states blue, not winning by large enough margins or lacking ties that clinton might have in like arkansas or neighboring states. 

Alot of these seem like they are meant to cause doubt in people. To make people think that their vote won't matter. 

Sometimes it is hard for people to realize that even as individuals and amongst the millions of votes that theirs does matter. So few people who are able to vote in the US do and there are terrible road blocks placed by laws and other restrictions that it does... no matter who they vote for.

Meredith went to the emergancy room about o late october. The bill was around $300 and then insurance company started pestering us saying we have more than one insurance carrier which we don;t.  When they finally admitted they did owe something... they paid $25 of the $300.  I alone have payed over $2000 into them, yet they are assholes enough to deny this bill. It's been pissing me off.

Almost worth everyone contemplating just setting aside what they are paying instead of paying... but then you don't have insurance to cover the what if's... but it seems that they really don't cover those that well so you might as well just get what you need done then declaire bankruptcy on those bill's if a major what if happens.

I've also been sideways demoted at work, So now I get to do less but more brain numbing work for less pay. I was hoping my current spot in auditing our future outsourced jobs could possibly get me a chance at an upward promotion with the more work / more pay aspect.  
Now why did they chose me over the other 3 options, Well one of them has picked up more useful skills.. I feel I produce more than the other 2. I suspect it's my lack of social skills, my cringing when people talk about obama as osama or creationism. I have little desire to interact more socially with people who consider people who don't believe in god (their god) to have no morals.

Aside from the extra days off due to holiday's it's been kind of a crappy week. And now the anticipation of mroe 5 day weeks of mindnumbing lameness..

Anyone out there have any good book series to read. Just trying to dig for more things to read.

Here's some series I don't suggest.
Kris Longknife series
And tentatively the "ophelia and abby mystery" books. I'm going to finish the first one and peek at the second one but it's not looking hopeful.

1. 1 in 4 US citizens have not read a book in a  year.

2. The reason the creators of the documentary "the War" chose to do this because a lot of students thought we fought with the germans against the russians in WWII

3. People don't understand why Iran has issues with the US... having funded a war against them.

4. Our president stated Nelson Mandela is dead, Nelson mandela is alive....
He's died, and so ends unfinished one of the better though slightly long winded and epic fantasy novel series.
Manditory overtime. I hate it.  Sucks also they tell you wednesday that you have to do 5-10 hours or come in on saturday. Lame.

My grandmother died. It is sad, I'm sure meredith has posted on how she went up to help. Work gives me time off, but the ideal event won't be for months, probably not next year. So I'm taking my berevement sooner than later, mere thinks I should feel guilty. I feel it's the only time to take it. I miss her but I felt I said goodbye when I saw her in april. Job isnt' good enough to not take what they are offering, and the time will be nice. To sit and think, spend a day at a bookstore.

On a really odd note, when I came home today all the tv's were on and the game system was on. The clocks were blinking. Can a power surge turn on appliances?

Books for trip

Al Frankens 
The Truth:with jokes
Michael Chabons
Summerland
Kim Harrison
Every Which way but dead
Glen Cook
Shadows Linger

I can't sleep during the day, and after 2 so-so nights I was hoping to get a good nights sleep. Then at about 1 am I was violently woken up by a dream. It wasn't my dream it was my wifes. She shakes me and screams "Are you cheating on me!" then for the next hour she's barrating me about her dream of me having an afair. 
Key to the whole dream was "grilled" lemon chicken which flavored the whole experience and even gave it a lemon tint. Supposedly it was over this dish in her dream that I told her about the fair. In her dream she did not see what the girl I was sleeping with looked like or her boyfriend this was all just information I had told her. 
I was doing a girl that i had been introduced/set up by her boyfriend. It was a poly couple. This was all during lunch break at my work. A work that has tons of camera's everywhere for security reason, staggard lunch periods and a lunch that is less than 25 minutes because your expected back at your desk before the half an hour is up. In her dream she asked me if I was still doing the girl a few weeks later and I said yes. 

Here is my plea if anyone has a dream like this please just let your partner sleep and attack them at one in the morning not at 1 am.

I suck I know, don't post. don't work on any writing as much as i like. Luckly work is so boring i've started a story i'm only working on during the small break time at work. No internet distractions and a knowladge that i'll be getting back to the boring stuff. 

I don't know if it helps, i think it does but i haven't gotten to a part of the story where i can get hung up yet.
will be there next weekend. ergo 9th to the 13th about. I know I'm a strange little freak but if you want to see me this is the time to let me know.
Just finnished reading Diamond Age. it was quite nice.
Stolen icon. Kittens are cute when they are in-animate and don't make a mess.

I write badly and numerously.  So I have the beginnings of half a dozen stories. Ok maybe a little more. I was wondering if anyone here was interrested in taking a look at them and provide some info on which ones I should focus on. 
Simply put I need to parse down my projects or to provide renewed interrest in a few older beginnings. 

I'd be deeply appreciative of any help.

It's this deep feeling in my chest.  I just finnished watching Firefly DVD series. I saw Serenity a few weeks ago.   Now That it is over I feel... Pain.. Loss.   Very rarely has a TV series made me feel this way. A few times the ending of a book series. 

What makes it worse is the loss of potential.  I never watched the series when it was on TV. But now I feel the loss. 

Kind of like when Strange luck was canceled. or even I'm afraid to admit it Joan of Arcadia.  I felt some small loss at Dead like Me and it's ending.  But not This much. 

I feel Sad.

It's hard planning  your life. Seems like I should decide between going for either Nuclear medical tech. OR Pharmacy.

Big issue is that I don't know if I will like doing either one.  The Tech would at least leave me outs. 

Why must life be so hard.  In the end my O-chem test grane may decide it for me.

You Are A: Pony!

Who doesn't love a pony? You are one of these miniature horses, renown for your beauty and desired by many. Full of grace, you are a beautiful and very special animal, full of strength and majesty.

You were almost a: Lamb or a Puppy
You are least like a: Squirrel or a ChipmunkThe Cute Animals Quiz

Do I know anything about football... no not really.  
yet I'm competitive so I'm actually learning more about it.. damn my competitive spirit.
Shit Rehnquist died.  We're really screwed now. For a long long time.

Bah, no one listens. When I say it's a bad day to attempt to out of the blue get me to practice driving on the road with cars they don't listen.  When I'm slightly angry, havent' eaten in 18 hours and have only gotten 2-3 hours of sleep....  I point this out but it's still my fault. 

With 3 feet of clearance I manage to get bruises, and knock stuff down. Why won't people just listen, and allow me to stick to my plan.

Not expecting much 

Please leave a one-word comment that you think best describes me.

It can only be one word.

No more. (And no hyphens.)

Then copy & paste this in your journal so that I may leave a word about you.

P.s. wife is not alowed to post we have enough one word names for each other.

My wife was trying to seduce me, then she started laughting and could not stop. 

Now I'm afraid she'll kill me because I gave her a small hickey.

Did I spell that right? Does it even matter if I spelled it right, because with miss-spellings of certain words you get more information through.  

Well Currently life is a little less interresting.  Books... either the price scares me or I can't find anything of my taste to read.  Writting... I have no idea what I want to write. Work... Would you like the butter layered. 

Lets just say that my desires arn't making it through the first leg of the race. 

Writting is the main one, but I have no goal to focus on and can't make myself focus on one.   I miss writing class. 
Most of what I wrote was un-adulterated crap, but atleast I got stuff finnished. 

Anyone who is listening who wants to give me a story goal can!?!?!  (Wife excluded)

Is anyone listening?

Already the drugs were kicking in. The control he felt over the steering wheel was gone. The will of meeting a destination got lost in what used to be a sense of reason, lazy hands now let the wheel drift to the right or the left. Cars honked and moved out of the way to avoid deadly colisions whenever the drifiting pulled him into oncomming traffic. It stayed that way for a little while longer, the near death instances that left familes white and shaken as that red pickup truck drifted into their lane. After drifting too far to the right a dich didn't move out of the way and the ride ended. 
         Jayson woke, mouth tasing of blood, body knoted in pain. His mind first wondered if the guards had taken advantage of him again while the drugs were in effect.  It was not feeling the pain in the usually places, and the smell of cooked motor oil that awakened him to where he now was. 

(hmm.... I am not a grammar god see)

If he asked me to sleep with him, I might even say yes.   I just saw clinton do Q and A (not T&A) at Arkansas University and he was so intelligent and right and kind and informed.  It made me think wow we were so lucky to have this guy as president. 
     I miss him, and I agree with him on so many things.  I agree that the democrats who run for office are being stupid because they are letting republicans run over them for no reason with misleading adds and other tricks. 

     I want him to be president again, but I would not ask for his life and freedom to be taken away by that job unless he volunteered.  I love that man.

I can't decide if I have no skill at writing, have no confidence, or just can't write because of stress or the fact I have no direction.

can I write outside of a class room setting?

when I try I can't get past the first paragraph and think my stuff sucks. 

ARG...

I have always believed that space is one of the next great steps for the human race. More money should be put into it, or the goal should be given over to companys by government mandate, because government doesn't want anything to do with space. 

      For 28 years the ship columbia has been going into space. Fourty two missions.  more than 80 times passing through the atmosphere under extreme stress.  
     1975 Columbia was flying and they kept it running long past it's safety date.  would you ride a 1975 Chrystler  off road more than 80 times?  It just wasn't safe and now we have tradgedy.

     Our government doesn't care about the space program, or the safety of astronauts.  They only care about the safety of the dead, those it was too late for.  
     NASA has technology so out of date, yet terribly necessicary that sometimes the only way to find it is on E-bay.  Plans for new space ships get delayed every year. 2006, 2008, 2012, 2020. 
     Did they want to wait until Columbia was 45 years old until they had a replacement?
    NASA needs newer better safer ships. Tragedy should not happen again. Yet we need a good space program, for the pride of the world.
